alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 8:09PM CST until March 08 at 5:34PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Steelville. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Valley Park. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River at Pacific. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Pacific. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Route N begins to flood. At 17.0 feet, State Highway AK begins flooding near the intersection with State Highway O near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Saturday the stage was 12.4 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 17.8 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Meramec River Pacific 15.0 12.4 17.6 16.3 9.5 4.9 3.3 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
